title: Generalize to the Population: Politics
question_text:
A simple random sample of people ages sixty-five and over living in Pinella County, Florida were surveyed to determine which of the two presidential nominees they favored in the upcoming election.
To which of the following population can we generalize the survey results to?

choices.text: All people in the United States.
Only people 65 and over in the United States.
All people in the state of Florida.
Only people 65 and over in the state of Florida.
Only people 65 and over in Pinella County, Florida.
